posts.post_title: Deleted thread - not needing this to turn into same thing
posts.post_content: Just taking this down.  So tired of these BST threads turning into this.

Apologies. I may be breaking protocol here. I want to own a Hindu HOF card. But how is this card even a 1? The face is totally obscured, there are tons of creases and the borders are weak. Help me. Why is this not an "authentic" rating?

[quote name="asphaltman" post=1881096]Just taking this down.  So tired of these BST threads turning into this.[/QUOTE]

100% agreed. Comments like that should go to you via pm, not in this way which hijacks a thread. Makes it really hard to make a sale here sometimes.

Dave,

Totally with you.  I’ve had my last few BST posts completely de-railed by negative comments.  I think that Leon and other board moderators should crack down on this type of troll like behavior hard.  As they (hopefully) teach folks in grade school...if you don’t have anything nice to say, don’t say anything at all.  

FWIW - I thought it was a respectable low grade card.  

Best wishes
Scott

Infraction given. This comment is 100% unacceptable. A PM to the op would have been the way to do it.

My apologies to the OP. Please PM me when this happens. If these members do it twice they are gone.

Personally I want owed more use out of this forum and BST, not less.
